entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Hope Slide
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing rain changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snow level rising to 600 metres before morning.
